name: webpack-svg-spritely
description: Plugin that bundles project SVG files into a SVG sprite
author: Devin R. Olsen <devin@devinrolsen.com> (http://devinrolsen.com)

scripts.test: npm run basic-test && npm run manifest-test && npm run entry-js-test && npm run entry-js-multi-test && npm run entry-html-test && npm run filename-test && npm run filter-test && npm run path-test && npm run insert-xhr-test && npm run location-body-start-test && npm run location-body-end-test && npm run insert-bundle-test && npm run insert-nothing-test && npm run combine-test && npm run ava-test
scripts.entry-test: npm run entry-js-test && npm run entry-js-multi-test && npm run entry-html-test && npm run ava-test
scripts.insert-test: npm run insert-nothing-test && npm run insert-bundle-test && npm run insert-xhr-test && npm run ava-test
scripts.location-test: npm run location-body-start-test && npm run location-body-end-test && npm run ava-test
